Title: Show the nearest arrival and departure stop for each trip
Show scheduled arrival times
Description:
For each stop in each trip's srcStops and destStops, show when the bus is scheduled to arrive at that stop, e.g.:

```
[...]
        "srcStops": [
            {
                "stopId": "1_18165",
                "location": {
                    "lat": 47.663593,
                    "lon": -122.375587
                },
                "scheduledArrivalTime": "some human readable time format"
            },
[...]
```

Title: Show predicted arrival times when available
Description: `arrivals-and-departures-for-stop` sometimes provides predicted arrival times. When it does, include that information along with the scheduled arrival time.

Title: Sort results by arrival time
Description: Display trips in order of when they arrive at the destination. Use predicted arrival times when available and scheduled arrival times the rest of the time.

Title: Allow users to specify their maximum walking distance
Description: Allow users to specify how far they are willing to walk to/from their start and end points instead of just using the OneBusAway API defaults.
